name: Lobotomy
description:
Puzzle type game.
It is about a girl with psychiatric problems with two personalities who must look for pills to avoid getting out of control.

Gameplay:
W A S D to move
Find the pills so you don't get out of control
Find the keys to open the doors and keep looking.

Developed by: programmers
-Juan Mora
-Nicolas Cardenas
-Jimmy Moya

Artist
-Carolina Peñaloza
-Ryu - Daniel Cortes
-Dave Nieves

Resources
